players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. Vote Bob."
Bob: "Alice, I'm surprised you found me. Maybe you were investigating someone else. I think we should keep an eye on the other players."
Diana: "Charlie was killed, so mafia is active. Alice, your claim is contradictory. Bob, you say you were investigated. I think Bob is mafia. Vote Bob."
Bob: remained silent.
Diana: "Bob, if you were investigated, you should respond. Silence suggests you are mafia. Vote Bob."
You: "I am the only detective and I found Bob mafia. Vote him."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
